name: Sonic Unleashed but, it's made with Unity Assets
name_original: Sonic Unleashed but, it's made with Unity Assets
description:
Sonic Unleashed but, it's made with Unity Assets is an adventure game developed by funnyfumohaha. It was originally released in 2022.
Sonic Unleashed but, it's made with Unity Assets is available on PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
